blogs.title: Long Read Review: The Impossible Grammar of Civil War by Ed Jones
blogs.summary: Ed Jones explores two books from Bill Kissane and David Armitage that reflect on the history of civil war, including the conceptual challenge it poses as a term that is – in the words of the latter – ‘an unstable, fissile compound’.

author.name: LSE Review of Books
author.description: daily academic book reviews from the social sciences

book_reviews.title: Long Read Review: The Impossible Grammar of Civil War by Ed Jones
book_reviews.summary: Ed Jones explores two books from Bill Kissane and David Armitage that reflect on the history of civil war, including the conceptual challenge it poses as a term that is – in the words of the latter – ‘an unstable, fissile compound’.
